note.p: Daughter of John Mytton and his wife Sarah Harriet Owen, sister of William Mostyn Owen, squire of Woodhouse. Married John Hesketh Lethbridge, eldest son of Sir Thomas Buckler Lethbridge, Bart., M.P., at Gretna Green in 1817. Of Chargot Lodge, Luxborough, Somerset.
Correspondence vol. 1, letter from Caroline Darwin, [22 March 1826]
Gretna Green, Scotland, marriage registers, 1794–1895 (Ancestry.com, accessed 15 December 2022)
Shropshire, England, Church of England marriages and banns, 1754–1901 (Ancestry.com, accessed 15 December 2022)
